commented_code:
Return results in SARIF format.
 
+## `--no-markdown`
+
+Should be used when using `--sarif`. Will remove the `markdown` field from the `result.message` object. Might help if parsing `arguments` is not working properly.

discussion_comments.commented_code:
@@ -53,6 +53,10 @@ Print results in JSON format.
 
 Return results in SARIF format.
 
+## `--no-markdown`
+
+Should be used when using `--sarif`. Will remove the `markdown` field from the `result.message` object. Might help if parsing `arguments` is not working properly.
discussion_comments.comment_body:
Docs should be written in active voice.
Also, I'm not sure about the "Might help if" part, but up to you.

```suggestion
Removes the `markdown` field from the `result.message` object. Should be used when using `--sarif`. 
```

discussion_comments.comment_body: suggestion: replace directives are not necessarily a debugging step, maybe we separate them from the debugging docs and add them into a section about development in golang?

Suggestion: provide some context on what is expected from the contributor...

```suggestion
## Pull Request Submission
Thanks for your interest in improving Snyk CLI. To ensure all our users have a great experience, please carefully complete all following fields. Any omissions will likely incur delays. 
```

discussion_comments.comment_body:
Suggestion:

```suggestion
WARNING: Will be removed on 15 August 2022
```

My understanding was that it is already deprecated today and on 15th it will be removed?
Also the date format should be the same in all messages, and I'd suggest sticking to the UK format we are using in other places as well.
